author: Mrwhosetheboss
description:
started a movie night literally the moment filming finished. it was unreal 🥹. All key product links here - Govee Lights: 
•⁠  ⁠US Amazon: https://amzn.to/4qhmc8x
•⁠  ⁠UK Amazon: https://amzn.to/4p7TdTG

Echo Dot / Blob 😅: https://geni.us/MvgWyeU

Belkin Chargers (that fold too): https://geni.us/S7Qxvqw
(and here's the sticky tabs I used to stop people fiddling 😂): https://geni.us/4Adj0xs

Slightly oversized TV, gifted to us by Hisense (who's also the World Cup 2026 sponsor): https://uk.hisense.com/

Media Wall built by: https://www.dtrcustoms.co.uk/media-units/

The only photo frame that's permitted (Aura Frame): https://geni.us/F929DH

Sonos full kit (including headphones): https://www.sonos.com/en-us/shop/premium-entertainment-set-sonos-ace-arc-ultra-black

Apple TV 4K (until it gets replaced lol): https://geni.us/WzWgx

We got the Somfy Motorised Rails from here:  https://capricornblinds.com/product/somfy-smart-home-products/

I spend a LOT of time trying to make my videos as conci
title: I Transformed my Parents Living Room - ft World’s Biggest TV (Hisense 116UXQ)
